USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO




CREATE VIEW gold.vw_trip_data_green
AS
SELECT 
    result.filepath(1) AS year,       -- safer alias
    result.filepath(2) AS month,      -- safer alias
    result.*                               
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
         )
 WITH 
 (
    borough     VARCHAR(15),
    trip_date   DATE,
    trip_day    VARCHAR(15),
    trip_day_weekend_ind    CHAR(1),
    card_trip_count INT,
    cash_trip_count INT,
    street_hail_trip_count INT,
    dispatch_trip_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    trip_duration INT,
    fare_amount FLOAT

) AS [result]
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM gold.vw_trip_data_green
GO
